story_07_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Brendan, are we there yet?
When are we gonna meet Norman?
story_07_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
There’s still a ways to go. Dad always says that
the journey’s part of the training—that’s why he
set up camp way out in the mountains.
story_07_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: And that has proven very useful to us!
story_07_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
That mask... I know all about you!
You’re those nasty Team Break guys who’ve 
been trying to steal people’s Pokémon!
story_07_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Ha! If you already know, then I guess I don’t
have to explain what comes next.
story_07_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’ll be taking your Pokémon off your hands!
